title: Automatic client repair
body: So sometimes I just get a random bugsplat when im loading the game and then my client has to repair.. Which results in low priority que, remake etc... How can I fix this?

replies.body: It sounds like something is causing problems with the repair, possible a block from getting those updates through.  Double check anti-virus and security settings with the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide, then download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to see if a Force Repatch can help instead.  Let me know!
